title: As a Result of Breaking an Otome Game, The Villainess Young Lady Becomes a Cheat! - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cheats   Childhood Love   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cooking   Determined Protagonist   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Goddesses   Hidden Abilities   Love at First Sight   Lucky Protagonist   Magic Beasts   Otome Game   Overprotective Siblings   Sister Complex   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World
author: Yunaka   ゆなか
description:
Charlotte, who was reincarnated as a villainess girl in an otome game, attempts to avoid the death flags (as any transmigrated villainess does). The goal is to spread the liquor that she loves all throughout this world! However, the juices and holy water that she makes for trial are all nonstandard…

Includes the common fun fantasy tropes, family/friends, adventure, dungeons and monsters, beastmen, and lots of baking/alcohol. A happy-go-lucky cheat isekai through and through.>
